item.title: Toy Story
item.description: ðŸŽµ You’ve got a friend in me ðŸŽµ Oh Toy Story. A solid animated kids’ film that started Pixar’s decade’s long line of wonderful animated films. It’s a great film that for the most part holds up even now. Well worth the re-watch. I do love the humor. HTe interplay between Tim Allen’s Buzz and Tom Hanks’ Woody. Absolutely great. Woody: All right, that’s enough! Look, we’re all very impressed with Andy’s new toy.
